summary: This document contains financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank, detailing account balances, transactions, and investment activities for January 2018. It highlights significant cash disbursements and investment income, providing insight into Epstein's financial dealings during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder at Deutsche Bank, with detailed financial records pertaining to his account activities.

persons.name: Arthur Tendler
persons.context: Arthur Tendler is identified as the custody officer managing Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Account Opening Balance
events.description: The document outlines the opening balance of Jeffrey Epstein's account as of January 1, 2018.

events.title: Closing Balance
events.description: The closing balance of Epstein's account is reported as of January 31, 2018, showing significant cash management activities.

events.title: Cash Disbursement
events.description: A cash disbursement of €12,461.54 was made from Epstein's account on January 3, 2018.

events.title: Cash Disbursement
events.description: Another cash disbursement of €12,530.00 occurred on January 18, 2018.

events.title: Cash Disbursement
events.description: A cash disbursement of €12,413.60 was recorded on January 26, 2018.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank, including account number 680519.
As of January 31, 2018, the closing balance of Epstein's account was $170,431.54.
Significant cash disbursements were made from the account, totaling over €37,000 in January 2018.
Arthur Tendler is identified as the custody officer for Epstein's account.
The document includes various financial metrics such as market value, income, and realized gains/losses.
